title: Has anyone been accepted for the alpha client?
body:
wondering if anyone has been accepted yet
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Probably not. Only info I seem to be able to find on when the alpha starts is that "the first wave of invites will be sent out sometime over the next month or so", courtesy of CapnBranFlakes in the [NA announcement thread](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/FzKmxWZk-league-client-update-alpha-sign-ups-now-open?comment=00130000) (posted ~6 days ago, for reference).
